title: Volcanic eruptions - people affected worldwide up to 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of victims for 10 number of Location and Dates.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).

Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has 7.55 times more Number of victims than Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Location and Date in the x axis and Number of victims in the y axis.
The Number of victims is highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of victims for 10 number of Location and Dates.

The Number of victims is appeared to be the highest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) and lowest at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002).

Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has 7.55 times more Number of victims than Location and Date Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Location and Date in the x axis and Number of victims in the y axis.
Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has the highest Number of victims and Volcanic eruption in Indonesia (October 24 2002) has the lowest Number of victims.
Second maximum Number of victims is found at Location and Date Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015).
The difference of Number of victims between the highest and lowest Location and Date is 898925.0.

Number of victims at Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) is 1036065.0 , second place is Volcano eruption in Ecuador (August 14 2015) at 800000.0, and thirdly is Volcanic eruption in Nicaragua (April 9 1992) at 300075.0.
The Location and Date Volcanic eruption in the Philippines (June 9 1991) has 2.81 times more Number of victims than average.
The Number of victims is 3685304.0 if we add up values of all Location and Dates.

data.Location and Date: Volcanic eruption in Papua New Guinea (September 19 1994)
